thread.title: Dennis Hengstebeck
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Dennis Hengstebeck

author: Dennis Hengstebeck
title: Dennis Hengstebeck
text: I just booked and wont be there for a few hours, however, my experience over the past few years with Red Roof Inn has always been aok, no friction, no bothered by nopisy neighbors and always fresh coffee in the lobby :) Prices are very reasonable so ENJOY
